mapper.select: SELECT sp.pathId as pathId, sp.srcId as srcId, sp.srcName as srcName, pd.fromId as fromId, pd.fromName as fromName, pd.toId as toId, sp.step as step, pd.toName as toName, pd.relation_type as relationtype from subpath sp left join pathdetail pd on sp.pathId=pd.pathId where sp.srcName=#{srcname} and pd.relation_type='投资'
